title: Parasitism, Parasitic Flatworms
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
brief_description: Traces the development of parasitic flatworms. Shows blood, lung and liver flukes and tapeworms. Defines predation, mutualism, internal and external parasitism and illustrates each of these patterns of behaviour.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
